item.title: Trump will study whether to fire Fed Chair Powell, adviser says
item.description: "The president and his team will continue to study that matter," the White House economic adviser said.

item.title: U.S. proposes lighter sanctions on Russia as part of peace plan with Ukraine: Bloomberg
item.description: U.S. proposals for ending the war were shared in Paris on Thursday, according to Bloomberg.

item.title: Trump has talked to former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh about firing Powell, report says
item.description: Powell critic Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Mass., recently warned that Trump destroying the Fed's independence would spell catastrophe for U.S. markets.

item.title: Trump's tariffs are 'inviting corruption,' Democrats tell Bessent, Lutnick
item.description: The letter led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren underscores a growing attack line as Democratic lawmakers mount their resistance to President Trump's second t...

item.title: Markets will 'crash' if Trump has the power to fire Fed's Powell, Sen. Elizabeth Warren says
item.description: Warren, a frequent critic of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, spoke after Trump wrote on social media that Powell's "termination cannot come fast ...
